ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_rainbow] Digest Number 131
ygData.msgSnippet: Fellow EQers: Wow! I have to say, What a friendly bunch! Thanks for all the intros and invites! Chris and I just started playing, so you 30+ level characters
ygData.messageBody:
Fellow EQers:
Wow! I have to say, "What a friendly bunch!" Thanks for all the intros and
invites! Chris and I just started playing, so you 30+ level characters might
be a tad bit out of our league, but knowing there are some guilds out there
is great. My first few forays into EQ have been very positive - I've met
some very patient and helpful folks at every step, and was even able to
build up a brand new character to 3rd Level in less than 2 hours of play!
Ok, so I'm in fear of being known as "Hammond, the Rat Slayer", but that's
ok.

As far as intros go, I'll post mine and give some info on Chris, although he
will probably join the list shortly and give his own:
First Name: Jack
City/State/Country: St. Louis, MO, USA
Gender: M
Home Page: www.geocities.com/~octoberash
Relationship status: Happily partnered
Main Character (Name-Server-Class-Race-Level):
Hammond/Lanys T'Vyl/Wizard/Human/3
Any other characters (Name-Server-Class-Race-Level):
Shansson/Lanys T'Vyl/Paladin/1
Favorite EQ Monster: ones I can kill
Most Hated EQ Monster: ones that kill me
Favorite TV Show: Farscape
Favorite Author: Terry Pratchett
Any non-EQ hobbies: LARPing (VtM), reading, cooking, Tabletop (CoC, D&D,
Travelers), hanging out with friends
A few words that describe you:
34 year old Pagan Bear, native of Army bases around the country. Slightly
loud, fun-loving and adventurous - always looking to make new friends!


First Name: Chris
City/State/Country: Chicago, IL USA
Gender: M
Home Page:
Relationship status: He's mine!
Main Character (Name-Server-Class-Race-Level): (I'll let him describe his
characters)
Any other characters (Name-Server-Class-Race-Level):
Favorite EQ Monster:
Most Hated EQ Monster:
Favorite TV Show:
Favorite Author:
Any non-EQ hobbies:
A few words that describe you:
Very sweet Druid Bear (yes, it's a <gasp> mixed marriage)

Thanks again to all of you for making us feel welcome!

Jack
